sentences.sContent: Rumours abound as to the reasons for his resignation.
sentences.sCn: 有关他辞职的原因有各种各样的谣传。

sentences.sContent: Examples of this abound in her book.
sentences.sCn: 这样的例子在她书中比比皆是。

remMethod.val: a + bound(边界) → 没有边界 → 充满

trans.tranCn: 大量存在； 充满， 富于
trans.tranOther: to exist in very large numbers
